description: The Junior Seminar is a requirement for all first year students resident in the College. It also helps fulfil the General Education requirement. The seminar allows students to work closely with a Fellow, and in classes of no more than 15. It is organized around weekly discussions, outside research, writing essays, and making presentations. Besides being exposed to a particular crossâdisciplinary issue, students will be invited to exercise their curiosity, think critically, and develop their written and oral communications skills. Topics will vary with the instructor.
title: Junior Seminar
